More Right

Hi there! Nice to meet you. My name's Keegan, and this is my blog – it's where I write stuff down after I've thought about it for a while. I hope you enjoy!
Blog About
@keegan_mcnamara keemcn1@gmail.com

About

I'm an ex-Research Scientist Intern at Amazon, where in the summer of ‘18 I worked on the Data Center Systems team and analyzed the power draw of different components inside of Amazon’s global network of Data Centers. I interned there in the summer of ‘17, too, where I did a large-scale analysis of hard drive failures.

I'm a Venture Partner for Contrary Capital, a student-led micro VC fund where I source deals and find the best startups at my home institution - the University of Colorado, Boulder.

I interned in a slew of roles at some terrific startups when I was in high school. These include Graphic Design @ Human Design, QA Engineering and Front-end Development @ Wayin, and QA Engineering @ Gloo.

Currently, I'm pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Mathematics with a minor in Astronomy at CU Boulder.

© 2019. See them clamber, these nimble apes!
